name: Rabbie Burns Saves the World! (And, by Extension, Book Week Scotland)
name_original: Rabbie Burns Saves the World! (And, by Extension, Book Week Scotland)
description:
Commissioned by the Scottish Book Trust for Book Week Scotland 2020 and hosted on their website, now also archived here.

~20 minute retro-style RPG featuring some of the greatest writers in the history of Scottish Literature.
